InclusionRules.name: Visit 6 months after first visit
InclusionRules.description: Patient has at least one visit 6 months or more after their first visit after 2020-01-01

InclusionRules.name: Not Homeless Indicators
InclusionRules.description: Patient has one of the indicators that identifys them as not homeless

InclusionRules.name: Exclude Homeless
InclusionRules.description: Patient has not had an indication of homelessness during the observation period.
